Best Cash Back Credit Cards in Hong Kong 2024
A cash back credit card is a type of card that offers the benefit of earning cash back on your eligible purchases, hence it is a great option for those who prefer to earn tangible rewards and save money on everyday purchases.

If you want to maximise your cash back rewards and earn other perks, explore MoneyHero’s cash back credit card comparison page now and earn money on every dollar spent!

Comparison Of The Best Cash Back Credit Cards In Hong Kong
  Cash back credit cards in Hong Kong offer different rates for different types of spending. You may benefit more with certain credit cards for daily shopping, other cards may reward you more for eating out or spending overseas when travelling. Depending on your spending habits, some cards may be better than others. Discover which cash back credit card is best for you and maximise your rewards!
Credit cards with the highest cash back for supermarket spending
Credit cards that focus on supermarket spending rewards may help you earn additional money back on your grocery shopping. For example, Mox Credit can earn 3% unlimited cash back at major supermarkets in Hong Kong like HKTVmall, PARKnSHOP, Wellcome, and City'super. The Standard Chartered Smart Card can earn 5% cash back on designated shops such as HKTVmall and PARKnSHOP, while the Hang Seng enJoy Card offers an 8% discount on Wellcome and Market Place by Jasons purchases over HK$100 on the 3rd, 13th, and 23rd of each month.

Credit cards with the highest cash rewards for dining
Dining credit cards provide various benefits and rewards for dining enthusiasts, allowing you to earn cash back or other incentives while enjoying your favourite meals. You can enjoy up to 6% cash back on dining expenses with the CNCBI Motion Credit Card. You can also consider the DBS Eminent Visa Signature Card which offers a 5% cash back on dining. 
Credit cards with the highest cash rewards for travelling and overseas spending
To earn the highest cash rewards while travelling and shopping internationally, there are several excellent credit card options available. The Hang Seng MMPOWER World Mastercard offers a 6% + FUN Dollars rebate on overseas spending upon meeting accumulative monthly eligible retail spending of HK$5,000. Another option is the CNCBI Motion Credit Card, which provides a year-round 6% cash rebate on JPY/EUR/GBP foreign exchange transactions of HK$20,000 or more.  
Credit cards with the highest cash back for online spending
When indulging in online purchases, credit cards with a high online shopping rebate can enhance your savings on local and online transactions. The CNCBI Motion Credit Card and AEON CARD WAKU WAKU offer an impressive 6% cash back rate specifically for online purchases. Alternatively, the DBS Live Fresh Card provides a 5.4% cash back rate exclusively for local online spending. Other options include the Hang Seng MMPOWER World Mastercard with its offer of a 5% rebate with +FUN dollars, and the HSBC Red Credit Card provides a solid 4% cash back rate.
